mapper.select: SELECT price FROM building WHERE building_id = #{buildingId}

SELECT b.building_id AS buildingId, b.price AS price, b.building_name AS buildingName, b.image_url AS imageUrl, CASE WHEN bm.member_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isBookmarked FROM building b LEFT JOIN building_review r ON b.building_id = r.building_id LEFT JOIN bookmark bm ON b.building_id = bm.building_id AND bm.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY b.building_id ORDER BY COUNT(r.review_id) DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT b.building_id AS buildingId, b.price AS price, b.building_name AS buildingName, b.image_url AS imageUrl, CASE WHEN bm.member_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isBookmarked FROM building b LEFT JOIN bookmark_count bc ON b.building_id = bc.building_id LEFT JOIN bookmark bm ON b.building_id = bm.building_id AND bm.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY bc.count DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT b.building_id AS buildingId, b.price AS price, b.building_name AS buildingName, b.image_url AS imageUrl, CASE WHEN bm.member_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isBookmarked FROM building b LEFT JOIN bookmark bm ON b.building_id = bm.building_id AND bm.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY b.created_at DESC LIMIT 3
